addStoreUser.passwordRules1: Password needs to have a minimum length of 8 characters
addStoreUser.passwordRules2: Password needs to have at least 1 lower case and 1 upper case character
addStoreUser.passwordRules3: Password needs to contain at least 1 non alphanumeric character: ~!@#$%^&*_-+=|()}[]:;"<>,.?/{
addStoreUser.passwordRules4: Password needs to include at least 1 digit (0 - 9)
